website_summaries.verdict: Despite a couple of minor design problems, this option is still a solid sander that is ready to go right out of the box.
pros: Powerful motor delivers 3.5 amps of sanding power
Light weight enough to easily store when not in use
cons: Dust collection port is not a standard size, so you may end up scrambling to find an adapter
Does not come with adequate storage for all parts

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this sander now for a couple months ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this sander now for a couple months. The sanding sleeves seem to hold up quite well and there have been no issues with performance. Most of my sanding has been on exotic hard woods (zebrawood, bubinga, purple heart, etc.). The dust can be an issue since it pushes back up through the face plate if you do not have a vacuum connected (I have not used a vacuum), but it has not affected the use of the product. I have not had any issues with excessive heat. The spindle seems to run straight and true.
customer_reviews.author: Bhurgh

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to sand a bunch of inside curves on a set of wooden (oak) folding chairs I am making. Plenty of power and the variety of drums has come in handy. Only complaint (very minor) is that there is no place to store the extra washers that compress the drums when you are not using that size.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a bench top
customer_reviews.text: This is a good entry level sander. If you need to shape a small project, it will do the trick. For any kind of production, it isn't the right tool. Very fun to operate and has a port to connect to a vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Good for a low-budget shop
customer_reviews.text: I have used it on several projects now and it will take off material with little effort. Pretty powerful too. Can't seem to bind it up but I haven't really tried to. Vacuum attachment on the back also seems to be pretty good when attached to my dust collection system. It is solid but has screw holes in the base to attach it to something more solid which is what I did. The power draw isn't too bad either as I have used it off of 15 and 20amp circuits without tripping the breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Did not power on when it arrived. Contacted tech person at Woodstock, who instantly knew the problem: motor brushes needed uninstalling and re-installing, a simple 8 min task (which may need doing anyway after prolonged use.) Sturdy machine, works well, has variety of spindle sizes. BTW, I don't expect perfection from machines that have many moving parts, are made far away and shipped long distances. I expect good customer service to solve problems, and I got it from Woodstock. Look fwd to using it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Woodson

customer_reviews.title: Nice sander
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sander for the price. Not too big and works like a charm. I wanted a drum sander that wouldn't cost an arm and a leg and this fits the bill. Does a nice job and fairly quiet while running.
customer_reviews.author: George G. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great sander
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t needed tech support. It is actually bigger the I thought it was going to be. Solid board surface, easy to use and excellent on/off switch. Great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Robert OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Great machine for sanding tight curves. Good price point and value for your money. Plastic base may be a weak spot in the durability department but I imagine it's to keep the cost down. It's some what louder than I thought it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Much better that expected!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this sander. It sounds crazy but it works as well as my buddy's large Grizzly floor model but with a much smaller table. I can't imagine needing any more sanding power plus it's light enough to put away when not in use. I use it for guitar building and hard maple doesn't slow it down. It's a huge time saver. I will mention that this one only came with one set of coarse sanding sleeves unlike other reviewers have stated. You may want to get a set of fine.
customer_reviews.author: Platinumbackline

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, instructions are clear and the product works well. I hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Steverizer

customer_reviews.title: spindle sander
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. just what I was looking for and at a good price. get some finer sanding grits. nice a solid and doesnt bounce around on my very unstable table.
customer_reviews.author: randy

customer_reviews.title: Great took
customer_reviews.text: I have a fairly large wood shop but did not realize how I needed the oscilsting drum sander until I got it, Great tool !
customer_reviews.author: David Porter

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: It was broken when we got it. The body is plastic and feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: armyminusr

customer_reviews.title: A pleasant surprise!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, great dust collection, quiet, light, better than expected. Usually, I buy only the best: Mafell, Festool, Woodpecker, Lie-Nielsen, etc. I took a chance on this and have been pleasantly surprised. This tool may possibly open the doors to other Shop Fox tools.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Finn

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertsed
customer_reviews.text: I received this sander on Wednesday the 4th, and when I plugged it in, nothing happened. Don't know what the problem was but Amazon was great with the exchange and being a Prime member, a new one was sent out on Thursday the 5th and it arrived on Monday, the 9th. This unit is solidly constructed and the cast iron table is a good base for holding work pieces. The only con I can say is that the motor is somewhat loud.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice spindle sander
customer_reviews.text: Great sander, good price, works well. I am very happy with it so far and very pleased with the quality of this machine. It is light, but yet has a very heavy table top, storage at the base is great for keeping parts close by and has a dust collector exhaust in the back for those who choose to hook up to a vacuum system. I recommend this sander to any one.
customer_reviews.author: Dudley Doright

customer_reviews.title: it sands. it Oscillates...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good sander. If I were to nitpick the only thing I do not like is the plastic rings, I'd love stainless or brass ones that level up to the working surface better but that would drive the price up a bit. I use it for guitar bodies, necks and many other wood projects. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Shop Fox W1831 1/2 HP Single Phase Oscillating = GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice to sand edges of leather holsters. Worked okay for a few minutes, noticed the suction from the vacuum hindered the power at every upstroke. Figured it was a simple piece and I got what I paid for. Used it for the third time today and within a minute the motor popped. Garbage. Wouldn't recommend this to anyone. Now searching for better quality because its slightly over Amazons 30 day return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Jefree

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a spindle sander for my knife making hobby. I like the cast iron table and the fact that it comes with all the sanding drums. The motor is very smooth and quiet. I have a very small work area, so I have to lift the various power tools I use up to my bench as I perform the different operations required to produce a knife (drill press, 4" belt sander, band saw, bench grinder, etc.). This spindle sander is lightweight, yet very stable in use. This unit does the job for me. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Poor Quality, had to return the first one because the motor froze up, Not happy with this item
customer_reviews.author: Richard O.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Had mine for about a year and have no issues. I'm an occasional wood worker and this machine is more than I could expect. Does a good job and the vacuum connection works great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: den

customer_reviews.title: Good, reliable sander.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for awhile now and I've been very pleased with it. I get consistently good performance and it has enough power to do everything that I've thrown at it so far. I've used this off and on for awhile now and it still performs like new.
customer_reviews.author: S. Andresky

customer_reviews.title: Fair price, no frills.  A little louder than you'd expect.
customer_reviews.text: This is one loud little machine. The design is adequate. There is certainly not much to give praise about. It works fine and oscillates about a 1/2".
customer_reviews.author: J. West

customer_reviews.title: More Power than HF!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it has significantly more power than the one sold by Harbor Freight. It runs very smoothly and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Checkmate

customer_reviews.title: Great deal fast shipping double boxed have used it some ...
customer_reviews.text: Great deal fast shipping double boxed have used it some works very well good power for what I am using it for. Great storage for all the drums and spacer disc very happy with this sander
customer_reviews.author: Guy W W

customer_reviews.title: Shop Fox Problems
customer_reviews.text: The first two didn't work and were sent back with no problem with amazon. Disappointed it had to be replaced twice before it worked. This was a gift and we were embarrassed over the initial poor quality. The recipient says the third try was good.
customer_reviews.author: big time reader

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic housing
customer_reviews.text: First time I turned it on it smelled like the motor was burning, not sure if this is going to last.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Brand unit sander would not power up. Removed the ...
customer_reviews.text: Brand unit sander would not power up. Removed the bottom plate and followed the troubleshooting steps in the manual. Used a volt meter to verify that I had 110V DC coming out of the bridge rectifier to the motor, but the motor would not spin. Removed the brushes. One was stuck. Pressed on it until it popped free, then worked it back and forth to make sure it would stay free. Re-inserted the brushes and sander powers up. Much quieter than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy H. Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very good addition to my woodshop. Heavy duty top. Powerful. I would recommend this sander to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The table service tends to acquire rust which is hard to remove. It is underpowered.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Powerful yet portable
customer_reviews.text: You can jam wood into it and you won't stop it although you really shouldn't do that. This sander comes with all the necessary sizes and some neat places to store the parts right in the base. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Danny U.

customer_reviews.title: Good sander
customer_reviews.text: It's a little noisy but runs like a champ. More than enough torque for your average woodworking projects.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Meyer

customer_reviews.title: sweet little unit
customer_reviews.text: sweet little unit. It's going to save me hours of sanding by hand. Ready to go right out of the box. Some people complained about the exhaust port - no problem, dug through my box of plumbing parts and clamped on a 1 1/4 to 1 1/2 fernco, now it fits my little shop vac - nice.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tool. I'm using it in ways that I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool. I'm using it in ways that I did not expect. It works great for sharpening tools.
customer_reviews.author: GeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Two units, Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: First one was dead on arrival. Amazon quickly shipped a replacement. Replacement also was dead on arrival. I contacted manufacturer. Tech support stated that it was a known problem with the motor and that the motor brushes were not making good contact. Other aspects of the sander looked to be OK. Size and weight were just about perfect for a bench top spindle sander and it came with a nice selection of drum diameters.
customer_reviews.author: RogueGeek

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertiesed
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a week or so and used it on a couple of projects. So far it has worked well and has had no issues. The plates and drums are easy to swap in and out. The duct collection works well hooked up to a shop vac.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: I use the heck out of this for building traditional bows. Works like a champ and very easy to change out the spindles.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Just the Right Size
customer_reviews.text: We make bowls and other items that really need a round surface. Sanding small items is hard also, so this has helped a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Carole L. Saylor

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, does a very good job for me. Even though it doesnt have the table that adjust to a 45 degree angle. I find it very good for the home hobbiyist and even for myself that does Advance woodworking. Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: David Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Great not perfect
customer_reviews.text: The unit is relatively quite. It's very smooth and comes with a set of 120 grit sleeves. It would be a 5 but the spacers are just short of sitting level with table surface, not a huge deal but can be annoying on smaller pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dee Anderson

customer_reviews.title: A winner
customer_reviews.text: Its just right for small shop wood workers..enough spindles to make all sanding ALMOST a fun job...Almost...Its a good item and yes I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: doug harter

customer_reviews.title: Good value sander for home shop use.
customer_reviews.text: This sander arrived well packaged, no assembly required. It looks like the same one sold under a variety of brand names in different color schemes but this was the least expensive version. For the money, it is surprisingly well made and a good value. I used it to craft some wooden toys for Christmas and it worked well, I used it for about 2h so far. I had no issues with setup or operation. It comes with 80 grit assorted diameter sanding sleeves, I also bought some 120's and expect to use them more often. The 80 removes stock quickly but leaves a slightly more rough surface than desired for final step. I may also grab some 150's.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly and has worked fine. This is obviously not an industrial product but for my weekend warrior jobs it has been super. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: FatMilkDud

customer_reviews.title: Can do and will do
customer_reviews.text: Tons of power decent quality for the price. I'd give it a 5star but there is always room for improvement in everything.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: can't get my1/2 in cylinder
customer_reviews.text: Great machine ,but Idid not get the 1/2 in sanding cylinder with my order,and I haven't been able to get in touch with anyone to fix the situation, other wise it's a dam good machine !!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Zorn

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed by the quality of the machine for a price. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Jolicoeur

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Received in good order. Seems to work great. Haven't used it for an actual project yet. Need to do some practice runs but so far, most excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Donn R. Schell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: A super machine. Extremely efficient & convenient/easy to use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: avklingler

customer_reviews.title: DEAD DEAD DEAD
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Paper weight First one was working well although not powerful. After a few weeks it stopped oscillating but still rotated. I requested a replacement unit which came last week. I did not have time to try it out until today. Guess what. It is D O A does not make a movement or sound just dead dead dead. In looking at the reviews I guess the last few people had similar experiences...........
customer_reviews.author: Dr RBG

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tool at a good price. Has a solid feel to it and does the job it was made for.
customer_reviews.author: Coast-Lover

customer_reviews.title: Nice sander, didn't work out of box and customer ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice sander, didn't work out of box and customer service said check brushes and sure enough they were stuck (15 min fix).
customer_reviews.author: JOE NEMITT

customer_reviews.title: Shop Fox Spindle Sander
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I wanted it do. Only use occasionally so saw no reason to invest any additional monies in a more expensive unit.
customer_reviews.author: Luther H.

customer_reviews.title: works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Got it at Christmas time last year, works great so far. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool for the money
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product only twice. So far I am well pleased with the results. I was surprised how quickly the 80 grit sleeve removed stock. I've seen better quality sleeves but can't complain considering the diverse sizes and cost of machine. I would recommend buying a set of 120 or 150 grit sleeves if you prefer a smooth finish. Dust collection works great connected to my shop vac. I highly recommend this product, especially for occasional use in a home shop.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby T.

customer_reviews.title: Shop fox sander
customer_reviews.text: Quality sander I really like the oscillating feature it removes material fast and comes out smooth even using 80 grit sleeves
customer_reviews.author: john r.

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: Just used this machine works well although i was disappointed with the length of the stroke would have liked a longer stroke to use more of the sanding disk
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the money it's your best bet. The jet sander is near $500.00.
customer_reviews.author: Sachs Woodcrafts LLC

customer_reviews.title: good sander
customer_reviews.text: s great i have nothing to say ut use it im on it everyday with wood metal anything i need to shape or sand
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and a good value for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of oscillating sanders over the years and this one stands with the best. It's easy to set up, compact, and powerful enough to handle the job. The dust port connects to my hepa system so it is virtually dust free. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Butz

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Not recomended for contractor but super for home used it's perfect. I built some chair and it's perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: stephhusky

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used for several Christmas projects this year. Never had a spindle sander before. This tool exceeded my expectations. Great price,lightweight to move around, and worked great and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Esselstein

customer_reviews.title: nice machine
customer_reviews.text: is a good machine with a strong motor would take note to the height of the spindles. other than that it wont let u down
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: The reviews we read were good. However the sander I received makes weird noises
customer_reviews.text: The reviews we read were good. However the sander I received makes weird noises...I took it apart to discover what looks like a part missing...fixed it, lubed it and it still makes weird noises. I suggest seeing a local distributor for tools. I am tired of getting the duds. And returning and dealing with phone calls was not what I bargained for.
customer_reviews.author: K. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my purchase. Easy setup. Move it around the shop easily. Light weight. Works great for the price. Happy buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Deis

customer_reviews.title: Another great addition to our shop
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY pleased with this sander. Put it to use on several projects the day it was received. I really like the way the unit drafts the sawdust away from the operator. The motor is strong enough to handle heavy drag on the disc without slowing it down.
customer_reviews.author: dan b

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this quite a bit in the month I've had it. It has performed wonderfully. Easy set up, reasonably quiet and chugs along.
customer_reviews.author: JeffersonOh

customer_reviews.title: shop fox 11831
customer_reviews.text: exceed my expectation, love it, do a lot of sanding and shaping. I highly recommend to anyone that use wood working. thank you
customer_reviews.author: QUINATA

customer_reviews.title: solid tool for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it for a couple of projects but it seems to have plenty of power. If you have a big shop this is not a production tool.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Shop Fox is a great - and inexpensive - oscillating bench sander.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a good tool
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived pretty beat up, but no damage to the tool. Appears to work properly, though I have not had the chance to really brake it in yet, I hope to test it hard soon.
customer_reviews.author: william fountain

customer_reviews.title: Good sander
customer_reviews.text: This is a good oscillating sander for the money. Comes with a good assortment of different size spindles & sand paper. I've used it several times with no problems. The sandpaper wore down pretty fast but I was sanding 1-1/2" Ipe wood, which is one of the hardest woods in the world. It didn't bog down unless I pressed real hard, which you don't want to do any how. It also will square up you're rough cut curves with the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G. W. Vaughan Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Now I can shape my projects like a pro can. Wish I would have gotten one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Two times a charm
customer_reviews.text: Bought a used one first which was broken, recommend getting new or refurbished. The new one received seems to work properly and will update once I use it for a time. Amazon helped make the change as easy on me as possible. I have used this a few times now and am pleased with the smooth movement of the spindle and ease in which you can exchange the paper/ spindles. Noise level is slight so hearing protection is not needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Shop Fox
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the item. It works great. Well worth the money. Has all the power I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Irishgrandmother

customer_reviews.title: works ok
customer_reviews.text: could be 5 star if spindle would move up and down more than 2 inches, if it moves that much. To use the top part of the sander I will have to set the 3/4" piece of wood on top of another piece of wood. The sander wood be perfect if you used 6" thick wood. If I had to buy it again I would just get the spindles for a drill press and save the room in the shop for something else.
customer_reviews.author: rlp review

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: This piece of equipment has not been used extensively, but so far it seems to work reliably and does well what it's supposed to do. It comes with a nice selection of spindles and sanding sleeves, all in 80 grit. You'll probably want to buy a 120- or 150- grit set to complement the purchase. So far, I'm not disappointed I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Shop Fox W1831 1/2 HP Single Phase Oscillating Spindle Sander
product_meta.description: Shop Fox W1831 Oscillating Spindle Sander w/ 5 Rubber Sanding Drums & 6 Sleeves
feature_bullets: 1/2 Horsepower Permanent Magnet Motor, 120-Volt, Single Phase, CSA Certified
Table Size: 11-1/2-Inch W x 15-Inch L x 1-5/16 H
Sanding Drum Diameter: 3/4", 1", 1-1/2", 2" and 3"; Sanding Drum Length 4-1/2-Inch
Sanding Sleeves: 1/2", 3/4", 1", 1-1/2", 2" and 3" (1/2" sleeve fits directly on the spindle)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars171 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
